latex:
Kim's flight took off from Newark at 10:34 AM and landed in Miami at 1:18 PM. Both cities are in the same time zone. If her flight took $ h$ hours and $ m$ minutes, with $ 0<m<60$, what is $ h+m$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 46 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 47 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 50 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 53 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 54$
